importExport.subtitle: Backup, restore, or migrate network configuration

export.description: Export current network configuration as a .zip file for backup or sharing.

import.title: Import Network Configuration

exportOptions.title: Export Options
exportOptions.includePasswordHashesDesc: Export agent group password hashes (for password recovery)
exportOptions.includeSensitiveConfigDesc: Export sensitive configuration information such as API keys and secrets

overwriteConfirm.title: Confirm Overwrite
overwriteConfirm.message: This operation will overwrite the current network configuration. The network will automatically restart after import. Continue?
